segments.text: I feel a sense of dread looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is just going to cause so many problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but worry about the woman slipping on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're in danger too, with that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared the boy is going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake this feeling that something bad is about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to keep overflowing, making the floor even more slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really worried about the safety of everyone in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just filled with potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
